com.commercetools.sunrise.payment.model

Interface PaymentInteractionData

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CreatePaymentData
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CreatePaymentDataImpl, PaymentInteractionDataBase

    public interface PaymentInteractionData
    This base interface ensures that all actions taken by the adapter can use a provided SphereClient instance and do not have to take care of creating one on their own. Created by mgatz on 7/20/16.
